mapper.select: SELECT d.DSTNTID AS dstntId, d.name, d.addr, d.phone, d.status, d.img, d.detail, d.lat, d.lng FROM DSTNT d INNER JOIN region r ON d.regionID = r.regionID WHERE r.region = #{region}
SELECT a.accomID AS accomId, a.name, a.addr, a.phone, a.status, a.lat, a.lng FROM accom a INNER JOIN region r ON a.regionID = r.regionID WHERE r.region = #{region}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trip_board (trip_boardID, title, nick, status, regionId, startDate, endDate, inputDate) VALUES (#{tripBoardId}, #{title}, #{nick}, #{status}, #{regionId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{inputDate});
INSERT INTO trip_plan (trip_planID, trip_boardID, plan_title, visit_order, trip_date) VALUES (#{tripPlanID}, #{tripBoardID}, #{planTitle}, #{visitOrder}, #{tripDate});
INSERT INTO course (courseID, dstntID, trip_planID) VALUES (#{courseID}, #{dstntID}, #{tripPlanID});
INSERT INTO accom_plan (accom_planID, accomID, trip_planID) VALUES (#{accomPlanID}, #{accomID}, #{tripPlanID});
